response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest standards. This exceptional item is valued at $800,000 by both myself and you, and I am confident it will exceed all your expectations. Considering its unparalleled quality and unique features, I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this remarkable piece into your collection.", "product_price": 750000}
